content.text: In a café at a train station, a cup of coffee costs \(3.25 and a glass of cola costs\) 2.15 . Gary buys 2 cups of coffee and 4 glasses of cola
Work out how much change he receives from a \(20 note

Work out how much he spends on food

Find the new price of the ticket

a square number,

.........  minutes   .........  seconds
